tool.help:
**What it does**
Finds sequences in common between two fasta files, based on header ID.
Given a left sequence like::
>seq0 A >seq1 C
and a right sequence like::
>seq1 T >seq2 G
You could expect the following outputs:
+------------------------+----------+ | Output File | Contents | +========================+==========+ | Common, left sequence | >seq1 C | +------------------------+----------+ | Common, right sequence | >seq1 T | +------------------------+----------+ | Left not in right | >seq0 A | +------------------------+----------+ | Right not in left | >seq2 G | +------------------------+----------+
